member.name: IMFSharingEngineClassFactory.CreateInstance
member.summary: Creates an instance of the media sharing engine.
member.param: A bitwise OR of zero or more flags from the enumeration.
A pointer to the interface. This parameter specifies configuration attributes; see Media Engine Attributes.
Receives a pointer to the interface of the media sharing engine. The caller must release the interface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IMFSharingEngineClassFactory
member.summary: Creates an instance of the media sharing engine.
